alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:03AM MST until January 11 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and gusty winds are expected this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
